name: Animal Paradise [NDS]
description:
'Animal Paradise Wild' is a life-simulation video game that features the player taking care of a variety of wild animals. It was released exclusively in North America on October 6th, 2009. Based on the prequel by the name of 'Animal Paradise', it was initially based on Japanese photographer Yoneo Morita's work who specialized in animal photography.

In Animal Paradise Wild, care for young animals by feeding, training, and playing with them. Roam through the savanna, the jungle, and other native habitats while snapping photos of your new animal friends. From a range of 18 different wild animals, take on the task of fostering elephants, cheetahs, lions, pandas, gorillas, zebras and many more exciting animals! You can even enter the animal archives, where you can find picture leaflets documenting the habitats, diets and other interesting facts for your favourite animal.
